burgers.description: Two all-beef patties, special sauce, lettuce, cheese, pickles, onions on a sesame seed bun. A true classic that never goes out of style.
Fresh beef that's cooked when you order. A quarter pound of 100% fresh beef that's hot, deliciously juicy and cooked with a pinch of salt and pepper.
A flame-grilled beef patty topped with juicy tomatoes, fresh lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, ketchup, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a soft sesame seed bun.
Tender chicken breast in a crispy coating, served with fresh lettuce and creamy mayo in a soft bun. Perfect for chicken lovers.
